Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Establishes a multi-agency study group to conduct a study and to make recommendations regarding the optimal pension and retirement plan alternatives which could be made available in this state
Summary: Establishes a multi-agency study group to conduct a study and to make recommendations regarding the optimal pension and retirement plan alternatives which could be made available to not-for-profit human services corporations in this state.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to directing the commissioner of taxation and finance, and certain other agencies and offices, to conduct a study and to make recommendations regarding the optimal pension and retirement plan alternatives which could be made available to not-for-profit human services corporations in this state
